Package net.philsprojects.service

Interface Summary
EventHandler<E> A generic handler of events.
ServiceFactory<E> A factory for creating services.
ServiceListener<E> A listener to events that occur within a service.
ServicePoolListener<E> A listener to the events of a ServicePool.
 

Class Summary
AbstractService<E> An abstract implementation of a Service which also listens to its own events.
Service<E> A service is a more friendly version of java.lang.Thread.
ServiceListenerAdapter<E> An adapter which implements all ServiceListener methods.
ServicePool<E> A manager of services that handles events by delegating them to a pool of services.
ServicePoolListenerAdapter<E>  
 

Enum Summary
ServiceInterrupt An interrupt passed to a service by pausing or stopping it.
